thread.title: Former Louisville basketball assistant resigns at UMKC
thread.title_full: Former Louisville basketball assistant resigns at UMKC

title: Former Louisville basketball assistant resigns at UMKC
text:
> Indiana Former Louisville basketball assistant resigns at UMKC In this photo provided by ABC, Katina Powell, center, appears on ABC's "The View" with her daughter, Lindsay Powell, right, and host Paula Faris, Friday Oct. 23, 2015, in New York. Powell and her daughter spoke about her book "Breaking Cardinal Rules: Basketball and the Escort Queen." (Lou Rocco/ABC via AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
